name: Healing touch
description:
Your goal is to heal the minds of all the creatures in a dangerous dungeon, to achieve this, the character has a very special power to use, he was granted the healing touch! turns hostile creatures into peaceful ones with a single touch.

[WASD] to move

[Keyboard and mouse] to control the character and select in menu

[Escape] to go to main menu 

[Alt + Enter] Switch to fullscreen
